options.name: Forceful Shove
options.description: Gain +1 skill with might. The distance you shove a creature is increased by 1 unit.

options.name: Action : Mass Shove
options.description: You take a specialized version of the Shove action that targets an additional adjacent creature.

options.name: Reaction : Intercept
options.description: In response to a creature moving through a unit that is within 2 units of you, interpose yourself. Both you and the creature must make a contested might check with the loser being knocked prone. If your target is the one who failed the check, the rest of the movement they were using is lost.

options.name: Deflection Specialist
options.description: You use your body, weapon and whatever is available to you to avoid attacks. Gain +1 skill with deflection.

options.name: Stubborn Body
options.description: Your body is just more apt at absorbing damage. Gain +1 physical and toxic mitigation.

options.name: Stubborn Will
options.description: Your willpower is more equipped for strain. Gain +1 aether and psychic mitigation and gain +1 maximum resolve.

options.name: Action : Bulldozer
options.description: You move 2 units and make a shove attack against a creature. If the creature ends up prone as part of this attack, immediately make an attack with a melee weapon.

options.name: Juggernaut's Weaponry
options.description: Big weapons are better. Gain +1 skill with complex melee weapons.

options.name: Limitless Energy
options.description: You are an unstoppable hulk. Gain +1 skill with endurance and +1 maximum energy

options.name: Behemoth
options.description: Creatures that are 1 size larger than you become eligible to shove. When you use the shove action and push a creature into a large object sturdy enough to stop them, they take 4 fall damage and also become prone.
